payload.content: Google Cloud's "Mathematical Framing for Different Agent Strategies" proposes a unified probabilistic formulation to quantify agent behavior, moving beyond empirical benchmarks.

name: Google Cloud's "Mathematical Framing for Different Agent Strategies" proposes a
content: Google Cloud's "Mathematical Framing for Different Agent Strategies" proposes a unified probabilistic formulation to quantify agent behavior, moving beyond empirical benchmarks.

payload.content: Context engineering is an emerging discipline that treats context as a first-class system with its own architecture, lifecycle, and constraints, aiming to build reliable, efficient, and debuggable production-grade agents.

name: Context engineering is an emerging discipline that treats context as a first-cla
content: Context engineering is an emerging discipline that treats context as a first-class system with its own architecture, lifecycle, and constraints, aiming to build reliable, efficient, and debuggable production-grade agents.

payload.content: The Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) is an open-source, multi-agent-native framework designed to enable active context engineering in real systems, based on Google's experience scaling complex agentic systems.

name: The Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) is an open-source, multi-agent-native fra
content: The Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) is an open-source, multi-agent-native framework designed to enable active context engineering in real systems, based on Google's experience scaling complex agentic systems.

payload.content: An agent can be theoretically defined as a Markovian probability chain, with mathematically optimizable "Degrees of Freedom" primarily being the Inference Functional and the State Update function.

name: An agent can be theoretically defined as a Markovian probability chain, with mat
content: An agent can be theoretically defined as a Markovian probability chain, with mathematically optimizable "Degrees of Freedom" primarily being the Inference Functional and the State Update function.

payload.content: Multi-Agent collaboration is formalized not as a communication protocol, but as an integral over the context space, incorporating a cost-regularized objective function to balance probability maximization against computational latency.

name: Multi-Agent collaboration is formalized not as a communication protocol, but as
content: Multi-Agent collaboration is formalized not as a communication protocol, but as an integral over the context space, incorporating a cost-regularized objective function to balance probability maximization against computational latency.

payload.content: The ADK's thesis of "Context as a Compiled View" serves as the practical implementation of the mathematical State Update function described in Google's theoretical framing.

name: The ADK's thesis of "Context as a Compiled View" serves as the practical impleme
content: The ADK's thesis of "Context as a Compiled View" serves as the practical implementation of the mathematical State Update function described in Google's theoretical framing.

payload.content: ADK's modular "Processors" and "Flows" enable the deterministic compilation of raw "Session" storage into ephemeral "Working Context," which minimizes signal degradation and operationalizes the theoretical search for high-probability manifolds in production environments.

name: ADK's modular "Processors" and "Flows" enable the deterministic compilation of r
content: ADK's modular "Processors" and "Flows" enable the deterministic compilation of raw "Session" storage into ephemeral "Working Context," which minimizes signal degradation and operationalizes the theoretical search for high-probability manifolds in production environments.
